channel.title: Need Server Development Help - It Helps Charity
channel.description:
Whats up server owners or server makers, I need help with a little thing that i'm true one of you can tell me. Its about making my IP Public. I done everything what people said to do (There was more than 1 person telling me) so i combined them all up and boom, Nothing.
I did No-ip, i did Fire Wall open, and changed ip route on client and server, all together didnt do anything. But when i try to log in it logs me in but it logs me in as 127.0.0.1 because it says "legendtown.no-ip.org" is invalid. Please help
But the good thing is that i'm doing this for Charity so if you don't know how then please join the server when i find out how. I hate them people that say there giving the money to Charty but there not. I will give 50% of are funds wait no 75% of our funds into Charty and 25% goes to Server Development.
If you can't help and no one else clan, and you can Host, Please be our hoster.

item.title: Need Server Development Help - It Helps Charity
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

I like how you say 50%, then you say “wait no, 75%” In the same post. It’s sorta funny.

OP: You need to forward either port 43594 or 5555.

Read full topic
item.source: Need Server Development Help - It Helps Charity

item.title: Need Server Development Help - It Helps Charity
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

People can donate without logging onto a server, and to be honest I really doubt people will donate through a RSPS, as opposed to giving through the charity itself.

OT: What’s the problem that you have with Port Forwarding?

Read full topic
item.source: Need Server Development Help - It Helps Charity

item.title: Need Server Development Help - It Helps Charity
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

HC Kush:

Japanesse Earthquake, thats all i can tell you untill you donate. But right now people can’t donate because server isn’t up. I know about portforwarding. I just have trouble with it

go to portforward.com or download uttorent to portforward

Read full topic

item.title: Need Server Development Help - It Helps Charity
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

Port Forwarding: Opening your port so other can connect to you. You need to do this if you want to make your server public.

What? You’re not telling which charity you’re supporting? Wow. Nice.

Read full topic
item.source: Need Server Development Help - It Helps Charity

item.title: Need Server Development Help - It Helps Charity
item.dc:creator: @HC_Kush HC Kush
item.description:
@HC_Kush wrote:

Whats the old deed of portforwarding if i may ask? and When you donate it goes to me which i give to Charity, and sorry you would have to donate to see what Charity you donated to.

Read full topic

Also it sounds like you haven’t performed the old deed of portforwarding.
